#Trying the Magento 2 devbox

[this document is a work in progess]

1 Clone the git repository git clone https://github.com/magento/magento2devbox-web.git

2 Move into the folder

3 Compile our custom image (expect it to take while…) docker build -t magento2devbox ./

you will see Docker downloading a bunch of “docker containers” to compile them all into one customised image.

[this document is a work in progess]
